subject: fix: resolve 5 race conditions and replace hacks with proper solutions
body:
Race conditions fixed:
- useMessages: stale closure in sendMessage via messagesRef
- useMessages: polling version counter to skip stale results
- useMessages: subscribe-before-fetch to close subscription gap
- useChats: debounce + fetch counter for concurrent fetchChats
- useReactions: pending ops tracking to prevent realtime double-count

Hacks replaced:
- onesignal: OneSignalDeferred callbacks instead of 100ms polling loop
- onesignal: state-checking loop instead of arbitrary setTimeout(500)
- ComposeBar: requestAnimationFrame instead of setTimeout(100)
- home: removed temporary PWADebugBanner component

Code quality:
- Extracted magic numbers to named constants across 6 files
- Added "Fix root causes" principle to CLAUDE.md
